name: Crystal Commander (Llamakazi)
description:
Description

Inspired by old classics I used to play as a kid, most notably the old Crystal games (Crystal Quest, Crystal Crazy) on early 90's Macs. This is my attempt at a spiritual successor to those games, but with my own personal spin/take on them.

Still currently in development (but fully playable), I plan on adding more objectives, more enemies, more items and powerups, global high scores, and more! Mobile controls are currently WIP but I plan on releasing this on Android and iOS at a later date as well.

Controls

Left Mouse: Acceleration

Right Mouse: Fire Weapons

Spacebar: Use Bomb

F4 (in main menu): Enter/Exit Fullscreen

Options

Coming soon! Gameplay first, then more options to come.

How to Play

Ideally I'd like to get the game to a point where it's mostly self-explanatory (i.e. no un-skippable tutorials). Still WIP.
